column3:
Well, there is clearly a user interest, if somebody paid for it, but it seems like this is subsumed by @gavinandresen 's recent miner/fee proposals.

No apparent dev review interest.  I looked over the patch, and technically appears to be correct.  I don't object to it, but I think we need a gavin ack/nak here, and he may nak it given other work out there.
I agree this seems redundant given @gavinandresen 's recent changes.\n
